summary: This is an email from an unspecified sender to an unspecified recipient, forwarding a Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) from Ireland regarding Jeffrey Epstein. The email includes confidentiality terms for the FBI's handling of the attached information and technical instructions for accessing the embedded PDF attachment.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: He is the subject of the attached Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) from Ireland referenced in the email subject and body.

events.title: SAR from Ireland forwarded to FBI
events.description: An email is sent forwarding a Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) from Ireland concerning Jeffrey Epstein to the FBI, with strict confidentiality terms.

keyFacts: A Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) regarding Jeffrey Epstein was filed by authorities in Ireland (FinCEN ref. FIN-15590-S0M6R).
This SAR was forwarded to the FBI via email on September 12, 2022, with strict confidentiality terms requiring the information be used only for investigative/intelligence purposes.
The email references an internal FBI case number (CRM:0115297) related to the Epstein matter.
The attached document is a PDF containing embedded files, requiring specific technical steps to access the full content.
